Orders dated November 17, 2009, have been entered in the cases of Global Container Lines, Ltd. ("Global"), Shiptrade, Inc. ("Shiptrade"), GCL Shipping Corp. ("GCL"), Redstone Shipping Corp. ("Redstone"), Gilmore Shipping Corp. ("Gilmore"), Global Progress LLC ("Progress") and Global Prosperity LLC ("Prosperity"; collectively, the "Debtors"), consolidating such cases for procedural purposes only and providing for the joint administration of the Debtors' cases.
